scripts.dev:admin: concurrently "cd backend && npm run start:debug" "cd frontend && npm run start:admin"
scripts.dev:user: concurrently "cd backend && npm run start:debug" "cd frontend && npm run start:user"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run start:debug" "cd frontend && npm run start:user" "cd frontend && npm run start:admin"
scripts.build-prod: concurrently "cd backend && npm run build-prod" "cd frontend && npm run build-prod"
scripts.build-stage: concurrently "cd backend && npm run build-stage" "cd frontend && npm run build-stage"
scripts.install: concurrently "npm install" "cd backend && npm install" "cd frontend && npm install"
